籤詩版本二:
Kuchedwa kulowa ndi kutuluka kukafuna upangiri, kuda nkhawa komanso kuda nkhawa zoyambitsa mavuto
Mofanana ndi mbalame imene imaulukira mumsampha, kodi zingatenge nthawi yaitali bwanji kuti ipulumuke?
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ndi chizindikiro cha kusunga zinthu zakale ndikusintha kuti zichitike.
Chilichonse sichikukhutiritsa.
解曰: Khalani osamala nthawi iliyonse. Kudikirira wolemekezeka abwere. Ngati mukufunsa chilichonse. Chinthu chachikulu chidzakhala mochedwa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ji Ping anaphedwa
Ji Ping, yemwe dzina lake lenileni ndi Ji Tai, yemwe amadziwikanso kuti Ping, anali dotolo wachifumu mu Mzera wa Han.
M'chaka chachisanu cha Jian'an (200 AD), Cao Cao anakhala nduna yaikulu ndipo sanaganizire mfumuyo mozama. atachotsa Cao Cao, adakwiya komanso adakwiya.
Emperor Xian adafunsa dokotala wachifumu Ji Ping kuti athandize Cao Cao. Ji Ping anawerenga lamulo lachinsinsi la mfumuyo ndipo anatsimikiza mtima kuchotsa Cao Cao, choncho awiriwa anakonza dongosolo limodzi. Mosayembekezeka, makoma ali ndi makutu.Kapolo wapakhomo wa Dong Cheng, Qin Qingtong, adakwapulidwa makumi anayi ndi ndodo ndi Dong Cheng chifukwa cha chibwenzi chake ndi mkazi wamng'ono wa Dong Cheng.Anasunga chakukhosi. Ji Ping kupita ku Cao Cao.
Ji Ping adapezerapo mwayi pamutu wa Cao Cao ndikumupha poizoni mwachinsinsi. Cao Cao adalandira nsonga, adatsekera Ji Ping, adamuzunza, ndikufufuza mtsogoleriyo. Ji Ping anakana imfa ndipo anamwalira atagwira masitepe.
聖意: Nyumba ikudzidetsa nkhawa, woipa akupempha ndalama, bizinesi yasweka, ukwati siutali, chilango sikisi, woyenda watsekeredwa m’munda, mbozi yaonongeka, ng’ombe zisanu ndi imodzi zapezeka, munthu wapezeka, mlandu wa anthu watayika, kusamuka sikusuntha, katundu watayika, matenda achita, ukonde uli m'phiri, manda afa,
第X籤: Nambala makumi asanu ndi anayi mphambu eyiti
